@graph.description: The Food You Love Made Vegan

@graph.caption: looking straight on a oreo mint cupcake

@graph.name: Vegan Mint Chocolate Oreo Cupcakes - Nora Cooks
@graph.description: Super moist chocolate mint cupcakes with fluffy chocolate mint frosting and an oreo on top! For all the chocolate mint and oreo lovers out there! Dairy free and vegan.

@graph.name: Vegan Mint Chocolate Oreo Cupcakes
@graph.description: Mint Chocolate Oreo Cupcakes that are dairy free, vegan and totally delectable. Perfect for mint chocolate lovers everywhere! Make these festive cupcakes for St. Patrick's Day or even Christmas.
recipeIngredient: 1/3 cup canola oil (or coconut oil melted)
1/4 cup non-dairy chocolate chips, melted and slightly cooled
12  whole mint oreos, optional for topping

itemListElement.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F and line a cupcake pan with 12 paper liners.
itemListElement.name: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F and line a cupcake pan with 12 paper liners.

itemListElement.text: In a large bowl, stir together the almond milk and apple cider vinegar. Set aside for a minute or two to curdle.
itemListElement.name: In a large bowl, stir together the almond milk and apple cider vinegar. Set aside for a minute or two to curdle.

itemListElement.text: Now add the oil, sugar, vanilla and peppermint extracts. Whisk to combine.
itemListElement.name: Now add the oil, sugar, vanilla and peppermint extracts. Whisk to combine.

itemListElement.text: In a separate bowl, sift the flour, cocoa, baking soda and salt.
itemListElement.name: In a separate bowl, sift the flour, cocoa, baking soda and salt.

itemListElement.text: Add the dry mixture to the wet in batches, about 1/3 at a time, and mix well with a wooden spoon, or a handheld mixer (or stand mixer).
itemListElement.name: Add the dry mixture to the wet in batches, about 1/3 at a time, and mix well with a wooden spoon, or a handheld mixer (or stand mixer).

itemListElement.text: Gently fold in the chopped up oreo pieces, then pour into prepared cupcake liners evenly.
itemListElement.name: Gently fold in the chopped up oreo pieces, then pour into prepared cupcake liners evenly.

itemListElement.text: Bake for 20-22 minutes. Cool completely before frosting.
itemListElement.name: Bake for 20-22 minutes. Cool completely before frosting.

itemListElement.text: With a handheld or stand mixer, beat together the earth balance and vegan shortening on medium speed until light and fluffy.
itemListElement.name: With a handheld or stand mixer, beat together the earth balance and vegan shortening on medium speed until light and fluffy.

itemListElement.text: Melt the chocolate chips by putting them in a small bowl and microwaving in 30 second intervals. Stir and set aside to cool.
itemListElement.name: Melt the chocolate chips by putting them in a small bowl and microwaving in 30 second intervals. Stir and set aside to cool.

itemListElement.text: Add the powdered sugar and cocoa powder and beat on low speed, then increase to medium. Add the melted, cooled chocolate chips and extracts and beat.
itemListElement.name: Add the powdered sugar and cocoa powder and beat on low speed, then increase to medium. Add the melted, cooled chocolate chips and extracts and beat.

itemListElement.text: Now add a few tablespoons of almond milk, until you have a thick but pipe-able frosting.
itemListElement.name: Now add a few tablespoons of almond milk, until you have a thick but pipe-able frosting.

itemListElement.text: Pipe the frosting onto the cooled cupcakes and top with an oreo cookie.
itemListElement.name: Pipe the frosting onto the cooled cupcakes and top with an oreo cookie.
